name: Gym Fit to Fat Race - real run jump-ing & wrestle boxing games for kids!
name_original: Gym Fit to Fat Race - real run jump-ing & wrestle boxing games for kids!
description:
Can you get these overweight wrestlers & boxers to lose weight and get in shape?

To lose weight fast, they are going to need your help!!

Watch what they eat, exercise 20x a day, and make sure they hit the weight room!!!

Once one boxer loses weight, move onto other characters such as a Sumo Wrestler, another boxer, and much more!!

Run on the treadmill, jump rope, box, lift weights, and much more to get fit fast!!
